alert.note: Alert for Covington; Forrest; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 1:24PM CDT until June 10 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Marion County in south central Mississippi... Forrest County in southeastern Mississippi... Eastern Covington County in southeastern Mississippi... Lamar County in southeastern Mississippi... Jones County in southeastern Mississippi... Southern Jefferson Davis County in south central Mississippi... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 124 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Collins to Morgantown, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Pickwick around 140 PM CDT. Sanford around 145 PM CDT. Pinebur around 150 PM CDT. Moselle and Rawls Springs around 155 PM CDT. Eastabuchie around 200 PM CDT. Petal and Baxterville around 205 PM CDT. Macedonia and Sunrise around 210 PM CDT. Lumberton around 220 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Seminary and Soso. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Covington; Forrest; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Lamar; Marion
